titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning the prizing of French vvines.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... Whitehall, this two and twentieth day of March, in the eighth yeere of the reigne of our Souereigne Lord, Charles ...
Arms: 23; Steele notation: for small and.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
